text: Peristernia forskalii, common name the Forsskal's whelk, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1875
title: Peristernia forskalii
